# Activity.ActivityUpdates.Iterator

**Structure**

An iterator for accessing individual data entries from the series.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Iterator
```

## Creating an iterator

- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces results from this asynchronous sequence.
- **Activity.ActivityUpdates.Element**: The type of element this asynchronous sequence produces.

## Conforms To

- AsyncIteratorProtocol

items.description: Creates the asynchronous iterator that produces results from this asynchronous sequence.
items.name: makeAsyncIterator()

items.description: The type of element this asynchronous sequence produces.
items.name: Activity.ActivityUpdates.Element
